extendedInfo.description: Shoot the Apple 2 is back with more challenging worlds, new game play and much better graphics!Alien is still in love with Miss Apple. New obstacles emerged. But donât worry! Alien has mastered new skills. Try your best to help alien reach the apple in each stage!How to play?# Tap on screen to shoot alien.# Cannon power and angle depend on the touch point.# Shoot to activate other cannons. Different aliens have different functions.# Pass level if alien reaches the apple successfully.# Use items when in need.# The less aliens you shoot, the more coin rewards you get.Join in the wonderful new world now!

reviews.title: Good,GOOD and good games.
reviews.comment: Very fun and made mind relax. My son (3+)like it too and playing that\'s everyday.
reviews.author: joni jono

reviews.title: Amazingly addictive!!!
reviews.comment: Only problem is that it needs an update. No new levels for months. Used to be a new pack every week or so. PLEASE UPDATE!!!
reviews.author: Danny Stutzman

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: This is the best game I\'ve played in a long time. Great time waster and I\'ve passed all levels with 3 stars. So fun!!!  NEEDS UPDATE ASAP OR \"STA3\"
reviews.author: Javy Aguilar

reviews.title: USED TO love all the frequent updates!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This game is a LOT harder than the original but at the same time, the updates have stopped coming out so can somebody at DroidHen PLEASE start reading these reviews and come out with new levels. It isn\'t rocket science guys! ...or is it........?
reviews.author: Blake Ly

reviews.title: Lots of fun but......
reviews.comment: I would give it 5 stars if I could get past world two without buying any coins I don\'t like spending money to play games and it doesn\'t seem right to me that if I have gotten through two worlds why would I not have enough coins to open up the third world otherwise it\'s a very fun game I love it
reviews.author: Melanie Brazeal

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, just as good as the first. Oh and I\'ve unlocked all levels without spending any money. Spending money is not required to progress
reviews.author: Antony Fossard

reviews.title: Happier now.
reviews.comment: Are there going to be any more updates. It\'s been over a month since the last update. Maybe a golden apple will come to save from the aliens. just a thought.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game.... BUT
reviews.comment: I played the 1st shoot the apple and got 3 stars on every level, so I was very excited to see there is another one. Right off the bat the only thing that is driving me crazy is I have already used the \"apple alien attractor\" & \"black hole\" on accident.. the thing in the left corner should really be out of the way. Also, I have completed all the the levels in stage 1 and the only way to continue is to buy more coins... I have read other reviews saying they have completed all levels without purchasing coins.
reviews.author: Tosha Hastedt

reviews.title: Great game!!!
reviews.comment: Please I need updates, long time with no play :( hurry please!!!!!
reviews.author: Gina Ramirez

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: Very addicting!! But needs a new update!!
reviews.author: Marisol Rosado

reviews.comment: Not as good as the first... must buy new levels, which I refuse to do so I\'m done.\tDone.
reviews.author: Susan Gravois

reviews.title: Good!!
reviews.comment: Sometimes luck is very important in this game. Those can\'t get full star, should try harder. Overall a very nice game to play.
reviews.author: Ken Lee

reviews.title: Wtf?
reviews.comment: No new levels in 2 months is this a joke? takes forever to get new levels one day to beat them...too ez.... game has became garbage fun till u beat it then i recommend uninstall. I can\'t even provide one star..1/4 star = failure droidhen
reviews.author: Joshua Torres

reviews.title: Getting boring
reviews.comment: I\'ve played 18 stages now and got 3 stars on all... it gets really boring. I wish they would make a final stage or something
reviews.author: nobo dynos

reviews.title: U can play only one level.
reviews.comment: After that, you have to pay. That\'s fine but don\'t call it \"free\" in this case
reviews.author: Martin Dim

reviews.title: I did love the game...what happened?
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what happened to the updates? Or if the game came to an end? Or maybe planning game 3? But some info would be nice!?
reviews.author: Steve Postma

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: where are the updates full 5 stars when starting updating again
reviews.author: Ha Alex

reviews.title: Awesome game! But...
reviews.comment: Excellent game, but can you please keep your customers updated about when updates will be released? having then weekly was excellent. We understand if that\'s too often, but some communications would be good!
reviews.author: Richard Terry

reviews.title: Reggiegirl
reviews.comment: I finished the first and loved it.. the second is great but I finish before the next levels are ready.. I have no problem getting the points..I just take my time and eventually I get the three stars.. keep them coming.. I\'m hooked.. lol
reviews.author: Donna Rex

reviews.title: Shooting that apple
reviews.comment: Love the game, updated and now must pay money for power ups instead of coins. Would rate 5 stars if it weren\'t for this fact. Also would be nice if you got a free power up everyday like in angry birds
reviews.author: Drew Guy
